document.full_text: u.s. safety regulators said they have expanded to 2.7 million vehicles an investigation into the possibility that straps holding fuel tanks can rust and break on ford motor co  f-150 pickup trucks from the 1997-2001 model years.
document.title: ford f-150 truck probe expands to 2.7 million
lines_and_colors: u.s. safety regulators said they have expanded to 2.7 million vehicles an investigation into the possibility that straps holding fuel tanks can rust and break on ford motor co  f-150 pickup trucks from the 1997-2001 model years.
